component.name: joycond
component.summary: System service to use Nintendo joy-cons as joypads

description.p:
joycond is a linux daemon which uses the evdev devices provided by hid-nintendo (formerly known as hid-joycon) to implement joycon pairing as default joystick devices.
It allows to use the Nintendo Switch Joy-Cons controllers as combined device or as separated joysticks.
It also supports pairing the Nintnendo Switch Pro, N64 and SNES Controllers.
